reviews.review:
All the developers had to do before 1.0.4 is to fix remaining bugs. Not only some of them haven't been fixed yet, but within the newest update the gameplay has been ruined and the only cool thing about the recent update is new outfit but that's it. Totally imbalanced and not worth playing anymore.

In the current state I don't recommend this game to anyone. Uninstalling and rating negative.
Really fun game to play with your friends.

Привет! Я хочу рассказать тебе все причины покупать и непокупать эту игру. Итак приступим!
1) Игра хорошая, отличная идея, (теперь) есть русский язык. Система уровней персонажа, и уровнем пристижа(Назовем его так), система прокачки персонажа за bloodpoints, в которой вы сможете открыть много много : Перков, подношений, инструментов которые вы возьмете с собой, к ним улучшения и бла бла бла :).
2) Очень много багов! И это не просто слова. Зайдите на стримы по данной игре! Багов море! За неделю можно насчитать 15 - 20 багов (у меня так).
Вывод: Игра выходит отличная, но много багов. Покупайте игру только в том случае, если у вас стальные нервы, и вы можете задержать огонь в пукане. Впринципе если не оброщать на баги внимания (так не получится) : ИГРА СУПЕР.

El juego es muy bueno, al principio da hasta miedo. Lo recomiendo para jugar con amigos ...el que los tenga.. en modo superviviente. Jugar con el achechino es mas aburrido o frustrante pues los supervivientes que te hacen el benny hill (troleo) y se rien en tu cara. El sistema de buscar partida es bastante malo, en rangos, lag, petadas,etc. 
Ah tb puedes salir del armario sin ninguna conotacion XD

Dead by Daylight - это когда в 4 человека чинишь генератор и вдруг подходит невидимый араб и ты ловишь маслину.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты заходишь в лобби, хочешь сыграть каточку, но четвертый выживший обязательно будет с него ливать в бесконечных поисках друга (мне плевать на всех - сам не играю и другим не даю). После чего эти ищейки узнают много нового о себе, о своих родственниках, и о том, с кем его мамка ходила в кино. 

Dead by Daylight - это когда вы вместе с маньяком кружите хоровод вокруг булыжника.

Dead by Daylight - это когда кудрявый может махать руками и ♥♥♥♥♥♥ пойми как сломать крюк.

Dead by Daylight - это когда очкарик может на дистанции 1337 километр помогать другим.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ баба может из травы делать препятсвия и ими же лечить раны.

Dead by Daylight - это когда баба с ростом как карлик и с -1 размеров груди бегает быстрее гепарда.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты светишь маньяку фонариком в лицо,а в ответ получаешь пилой по имбальнику.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты видишь,как твой напарник убегает от маньяка... в твою сторону... и маньяк продолжает охоту ужe за тобой.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты сидишь в кукурузе и тут тебе в спину влетает пила.

Dead by Daylight - это когда уже надо открыть выходы, ты попадаешь в капкан и тебя уносять в падик на крюк.

Dead by Daylight - это когда баги могут спасти тебе жизнь, а иногда нет.

Dead by Daylight - это когда ты хочешь играть в эту игру и хочешь.

Dead by Daylight - это когда маньяк наступает в МЕДВЕЖИЙ капкан,но ему наплевать так как его ноги сделаны из ТИТАНА.

Dead by Daylight - это, когда ты купил делюкс издание, но толку от него нет, кроме 3 ключей для БЕТЫ.

11/10 генераторов.

Not many games can put me at the edge of my seat yet still have me invested into the game...  This game is one in a million for me.  I can play with friends, I can have the horror element, and I can still have fun...  They don't add cheesy jumpscares like many horror games that come off tired.  This game is a damn solid 9/10.   One point off because of the horrendous MM... Took us 20 minutes to find a match once!
很好玩 、

UPDATED:

I really enjoy this game. The Devs put out regular new content, usually broken or unbalanced at the time of release but still good content.

I continuously come back to this game because it's just fun. There is something about it that even when you know your going to lose you still enjoy the struggle of trying to survive.

PROS
- Scarry for first few games
- great Concept

Cons
- hackers
- lag/lag switchers
- poor match making
- no balance for the hunted on many levels
- small maps 
- after few games your fright turns to anger from the lagg/hackers and overall BS you gotta put up with on a reg basis.
- Simple bugs not fixed (like small crack in the ground will trap you)
- no insentive for hunter to not stand face to face with you on a hook and BUG it so noone can even pull you off
- when knocked down you can crawl away and recover, but you dont recover you still need someone to get you up what is impossable if your one of last ones left
- hunter can drag you around for as long as he wants if your last can keep stepping into his own trap over and over and if you wanna leave you lose all your points so your friend has to sit there and wait for another 15 20 mins while hunter has his way with you
-No chat or communications(only for small time before start what is used to test your connection yourself by timing how long it takes to show up in chat log)
-and much more

Take what i say with a grain of salt i guess but in its current form as a fully "released" product I cant say its particularly worth it yet. 

Also: TL;DR - Game has balance issues introduced thanks to its perk systems operating off of random drop a la Battleborn that make themselves blatantly apparent. Once the "Scary" atmosphere wears thin like it did with Left 4 Dead you'll find the gameplay is fairly lacking to make up for it at least on the survivors side (If it ever had that scary effect on you at all) Unlike L4D who's gameplay was still solid enough to be entertaining well into its own sequel. Refunded immediately cause I'd only ever play with friends, meaning having to be on survivor team which I could tell would wear thin [i]quick[/i].
-Im sure killer is fun to play though but I didnt bother trying.

The game clearly has some balancing issues mainly revolving around the now mandatory Multiplayer practice of an unlock system made only worse by the introduction of the new up-coming method of how multiplayer games try getting their hooks in you IE Randomized drops.
And on top of that if your watching streamers play do keep in mind it comes off very much so like one of THOSE games you know streamer bait, More fun to watch then to play because as it stands the gameplay isnt all that entertaining. I got more spooked by the Left 4 Deads then this game so the jump scare angle doesnt really anything to make up for the bland gameplay... Im sure theres more too it. But Im just not seeing it myself.
I'd imagine killer gameplay is far more entertaining then survivors but after queueing up with friends (the matchmaking is pretty bad in the game right now but I'm not docking points for that largely because its unfortunatly par for the course anymore and we WERE able to get into a few games) If I'd be stuck playing survivors in order to play with my friends then I'd rather hoist myself up on the killers hooks myself.

в жопу баланс для манов, конечно, да. 
в целом игра топ, однако каждое длс добавляет имбового убийцу, которого успевают занерфить только к выходу следующего .

Not yet. Game has a lot of potential, but recurring network/lobby issues and unbalanced matchmaking cause the experience to be flawed.

As a suggestion, I feel that dead teammates could still play and somehow help the survivors (e.g. turn into a crow and help with temporary sights of the killer), as early kills make the game close to impossible for the survivors as there's no channel for communication.

this games pretty fun I must say but there are moments that actually do scare the crap outta you. the multiplayer is a bit buggy and it still needs to be optimized in area but it is worth every damn penny of the 20 they are selling it for. pick this up if you like co-op amongst other reason why you should get this game.

我算是早期玩家了 以前黎明是真吓人 我表示我真没作弊啥的联机游戏重来不作弊  很久很久以前确实改过档血点  回来顺便玩玩你现在给我封了号  什么意思啊  还有这游戏当个屠夫 玩的菜 就要被侮辱 只要是人没抓完就被嘲讽 属实素质真好  我屠完全部咋没人说 屠夫会玩啊 厉害啊？？？ 曾经用弗莱迪(没改版前的)屠夫玩到一段  基本上屠杀全部 越到靠前段位就遇到很会玩的人皇 (就 必须带配件 他们也基本带好了配件速修 还有紫手电)  一次没遇到过说屠夫玩得好的 会玩的逃生者是真没素质  溜完还嘲讽 真够恶心的  游戏而已 何必打完还要嘲讽下  觉得自己牛逼   本身 没抓到人也有很多原因啊  地图不会 技能没带好  还有现在屠夫是真的弱  天天哭求生弱 只是自己没遇到会玩的队友而已  开黑的早就一直在修电机 另个人溜屠夫   不带厄咒  基本跑几个板子区  电机都开的差不多了 不死追一个人  分开追打倒在地  基本凉凉 每个人两条命  还不算毁灭和时不待我改版后  还有啥新技能 还可以抗 都有用  这些时间早够开完电机跑路了 懒得申诉 监测属实弟中弟 不看看玩了多久时间了 真当我是新手啊开挂透视？昨天屠了几次全部 还复仇一次 被那人同伴救了打完就骂我夹哥菜 后面用弗莱迪 杀到没脾气  弗莱迪本来就自带透视啊？？离远点不就看到入梦气场了啊 垃圾开放商 你要说我几年前改档封号我没意见 要是说我作弊 nmsl nmsl nmsl nmsl

I honestly came from the days   earlier on where the game community was still forming and  the bugs were alot less. 

What I appreciated from it varies   quite a bit.  And  the bad far outweighs the good. 

The dark storyline, as vague as it was actually pretty cool.  I'm a huge  cosmic horror fan and  I'm thrilled to finally see the genre get some love  in  the more recent years.   

This  was a genre making game along with it's cousins, Friday the 13th, Evolved, and Last year.  The  group v monster  is  fun in concept,  but if your not careful you can have a very sloppy execution.  Something Dbd tends to skid on it's face alot with since  it's early days and it's only gotten worse  as the community has aged. 

With  Group V Monster games, balancing  correctly is a huge issue.  
For Dbd in particular, this game  favors   the killers heavily and zeros in on points and  a highly competive atmostphere.  I do not like this .  But then again I'm not competitive by nature so take   the dependancy on a point system with a grain of skeptical salt.  If your into that thing, this game could be for you. 

In the game, if you are a survivor  now  a days you'll probably find yourself  the subject of  a tunneling camping killer.   

Tunneling is when  you are basically  mowed down  by a killer until you are dead.   This means injuring you, putting you on a hook,  usually  diddling  around  near by ( 8 or 12 feet which is camping  I don't care what any of you guys think) ( When you can move as  quickly as most of the killers  it's  still an enormously @**h*** move #fightme)   until one your friends pulls you off a hook to get points and your injured self is  a target again and the process  is repeated into your  dead by being hooked.   Which honestly wouldn't be so bad except ( well no... it is bad from start to finish never mind.)   

Granted I'm not saying   that  hard focusing on a player in a game  should be against the rules.  But  after  the  20th game in the cycle where you see this behavior either against you or  one of your  fellow team mates,   the charming unpleasantness that you dug into this game for   just stops being charming.  It  starts being irksome.

 Then you really start  hating everyone that's elected  to play a killer.  But  honestly is  it really their  fault they're playing killer now?  Why are they playing killer? Probably because  the Dev's have made it next to impossiable to  escape as a  survivor and they just want some points  dammit.    They would never admit this though because  the troll like  portion  of the killer  mains  that  enjoy  camping  and  tunneling for the sheer purpose of  making survivors mad ( you know who you are)  will accuse you of being salty and  numerous instructions   of them telling you to "git gud noob" .  Then you start  remembering  the  few and far between matches that  you actually had fun in.  At first they were  2 in five roughly.. then  2 in six.. then 1 in eight.  Then  the number stretches from there while you  witness all  the  toxic  crap the killers  continue  pile on you because you are a survivor, and thusly aren't here to enjoy the game. Your here to  give them points.  So tunnel tunnel camp ... ded.  

Then  it starts being  incredably tiresome.    Then you start to notice the   enormous grind  of the game.  The points you need to gather to purchase  things like perks for your character  become very noticable.  

Supposedly  the  survivors can be toxic.  I don't know, I admit freely I only played a killer  a few times and I can believe this.    When I do  offer to get lunch for the entity   I did  notice the survivors  tended to crowd  around  the hook,  seemingly not noticing  I could see them quite plainly as I was dropping their friend on their hook.   And yes, afterward I was accused of camping. I've been in groups were  t-bagging the killer was a thing in the era of palette spam . I'll readily admit I've done it  once or twice   just to get the killer to chase me.  Next to the palette spam it was one of the only things I could do  to in my defense and have my teams back.Obviously  this isn't a thing anymore with almost all of the palettes  gone from the game . Along with a harsh  window leap  option   so if your a survivor you only have the option of leaping through a window twice.  Wish they would  up that at least, I understand why it was put in kind of. It got kind of tiresome having  to chase a survivor in circles. But  it just kicks the teeth in of the rare  persons that didn't do that. ( I didn't or at least tried not to. I got my ass handed to me a lot but  my main focus was   making sure the killers were having fun. Back then.  I was  pretty naive and assumed most of the killers felt the same. ) 

So  in short, both sides  are toxic.   The killers way more so, because they have the favor of  the devs, and most of every update you'll notice is  killer mains either  crabbing because the survivors got a tiny  boost, or  them  gloating because the killers  got  up upgraded and  something on the survivor side got nerfed.  Again.  And again.    I've noticed   alot of gloating lately and   enormous joy of  making  the survivors salty.  Like  just  an uncomfortable amount of  ill will  towards the opposition usually in the  forums.  

I'm all for  killers having a huge leg up against  survivors.  That's  part of playing the part in a horror movie right? Traditionally only one or two survive.  But  when none  survive,  and all  I hear after a match  how easy it was  to camp me or my friend and  we  lose  the points needed to  purchase items and upgrade ourselves with ( unless we want to spend money on a toxic repetitive game #paytoplay)  and  if we  are pissed because  this is the  20th killer in a row that night to play this way   we are  just being salty....  well.. it just  stops being  fun.  I suppose I could reinstall ,  go over to killer and  experience  all the toxicity   the  survivors  in the game have to offer. But  I've  gotten to 1st rank before in the survivor character  that I enjoyed playing and that was enough for me. 

  I think  would rather just get off my computer, step out of the fog  put on some ambient music and  curl up with some tea outside.   I think I'll go do that, and enjoy the day light.  Cheers all.
if this is really a team game then the party should get points even if one person makes it, to easy for the hunter

this game is broken. it's an early access game without the label. matchmaking can just sometimes not work for no apparent reaosn at all. no party system forces you to play with complete strangers who go about on their own way while you walk around aimlessly. not to mention the ONLY player who can host the game is the killer. incredible balancing issues, hilarious and stupid glitches, a broken rank system, and a hacker's paradise. buy this game in 15 years when it's finally out of early access. or you have 5 other friends who don't mind a buggy mess.
This is maybe 20% of a game. Not worth the money at all with all the bugs and problems. I have 3.5 hrs on record and probably only 40 minutes spent actually getting to play the game.
游戏非常好玩 ，值得嘉奖，但是无奈bug实在是太多，已经影响到游戏的体验了，而且改档的太多，开发商也不管，这绝对是一种破坏游戏环境的行为，希望开发商能够继续努力，改正这些缺点，毕竟这个游戏才出了一个多月，开发商有的是时间慢慢完善这个游戏。

But don't worry they brought out new outfits for the survivors! That shoudl help you get in a game with your BRAND NEW OUTFIT! WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOH

O jogo tem uma temática uma gameplay boa, uma temática incrível, porém tem muitos problemas. (e lá vem textão)
MUITOS problemas de "Rubber Banding", um tipo de lag insuportável que faz você perder loops e morrer, enfim, já cai várias vezes de sobrevivente porque na minha tela eu já tinha dado vault numa pallet e na visão do killer eu ainda estava nela e a prioridade da BHV é lançar mais conteúdo invés de consertar uma coisa que assombra esse jogo desde o lançamento, a conexão.
Acho que o principal problema do jogo é os "band aid fixes", ou seja, eles nunca fazem um balanceamento saudável no jogo e sim mandam Perks para consertar algum problema do jogo, por exemplo, muitos problemas de killer camperando em você? Use Borrowed time.
Perseguições acabando muito rápido? Use Dead Hard.
Quer prevenir tomar um gen rush? Use Corrupt Intervention
Ganhando pouquíssimos pontos de sangue e demorando muito para upar? Use oferendas e perks de aumento de bloodpoints, enfim, o jogo nunca tem uma solução fixa para problemas.
O Grind é SIMPLESMENTE RIDÍCULO, eu com 300 horas de jogo não tenho nem metade dos perks de sobrevivente e muitos menos de killer (porque eu jogo muito mais de sobrevivente) e isso é um problema que cada vez se agrava mais no jogo com um novo lançamento de personagens, e esse é o problema mais fácil de resolver, aumentem os bloodpoints ganhos, tirem as categorias 1-2-3 de perks e tenha apenas uma, MUITAS soluções e a BHV NUNCA ouviu nenhuma.
Enfim, é um baita texto mas precisava ser dito porque eu gosto muito desse jogo e vejo muito potencial desperdiçado e uma teimosia muito grande da produtora do jogo em deixar o jogo melhor. 
Veredito final, se vocês forem jogar saibam que esse é o jogo mais estressante que existe, porém ele tem tanta alma e potencial que vai fazer você se apaixonar por ele, mesmo que seja uma relação de amor e ódio kkkkk, então se você estiver disposto a se estressar muito enquanto joga, vale a pena, se não passe MUITO LONGE.
Takes forever to get into a game because the matchmaking is broken as fuck.

Bought this game on release date. I have only been able to play 4 or 5 matches because of wanting to play with friends. Despite not having a matchmaking system off the bat they finally intergrate one a month later. Even that system cannot find matches with other individuals online. Not worth your money, do not buy unless you like dissapointment!

I was honestly dissapointed. Yes I know this is a game that is still in development and it is still an enjoyable expierince. Sadly what this game promises is clouded and usually very hard to expierince due to the insane lobby system. IT is unesscarily frustrating as the Survivors pop in an out of servers and Killers often close the lobbies early. It literally makes the game unplayable and stops anyone from having a good time. I love the game, but it needs some more work. When it works it is amazingly fun and I simply cannot wait till my friends get their copies and we can all sit down and enjoy it together. If you can get over the lobby system and don't mind a long wait the game is worth it.

UPDATE: 2/17/2021

A lot of my opinions have changed since my original review, especially regarding survivor power versus killer power. I've left my old review below which you can take a look at, although I don't actually think it's much helpful today. That being said, Behavior Interactive's stance towards this game is actually mindboggling. They are insistent on making the game buggier every single patch since they're completely unwilling to spend development time untangling their spaghetti-code. They only development time they spend on anything that isn't directly related to printing money is visual updates, since large graphical updates probably bring in new players and keep the game looking fresh for them. It's painful because Dead by Daylight has a lot of potential to be a good game, it's just that the developers are complacent keeping players perpetually frustrated with it because it's more profitable to do so. The Play the Beta they released for this patch brought in a ton of critique before it released and not a single major complaint was addressed before it went live. The only reason DBD is successful in its current form IMO is because there's no other meaningful competition with this particular type of gameplay. As such, I can't recommend this game, and it's the reason that despite my absolutely astounding amount of hours I haven't spent a single penny on this game beyond the initial purchase. They have proven that they don't deserve my money. I hope if you're reading this, you also take a similar stance in rejecting any paid content they inject into this game. Yes, that includes new killers, survivors, etc. Thanks for reading!

OLD REVIEW: (Yikes, I was even saltier back then.)

To sum up Dead by Daylight (DBD) in a nutshell:

-really wanted to recover instead of hop through escape hatch, thx game

-really enjoy constant survivor nerfs cuzz 2 OP 2 EZ

-really like killing 3-4 people on average when I play killer, much fun

-horrendous UI problems over a month into the game, seriously?

-developers that vehemently argue that flashlight is useful in the hands in a skilled survivor

OVERALL

Dead by Daylight is a fantastic game idea completely botched by the messed up vision of the developers, combined with what I can only describe as utter laziness. The fact that there are still game-breaking bugs that me and my friends experience over a month into release is crazy, especially when people spam the forums with them and complain about it constantly. I'm not sure exactly what the developers have been doing since the game has been released, considering that the only thing they've actually done is add survive with friends (which was supposed to be in before release, by the way.) and nerf survivor every patch with miniscule overall changes. No keybinding, no sensitivity options, no brightness options, absolutely nothing. Despite having sinked so many hours into this game already, I'm utteraly dissapointed by what I've seen and the latest patch has officially broken my back. I'll be waiting until the game is actually a finished product to actually take it seriously again, since it should really still be in beta.

Loved it, great game idea ruined by poor balance, missing vital features, and broken matchmaking / the number of people hosting servers in china.  Because there's no reliable in built method to determine if you have an atrocious server host or not (people spam chat as a test, which works but is frustrating and it seems anytime you forget to do it, bam, chinese host) I can't reccommend the title.

I got my money's worth, not even mad, but until there's either server locks to keep people from China hosting in north america, or there's some built in way to realize the host player (the killer) has a garbage connection to you, it's just not fun anymore.

EDIT:  Not sure if matchmaking was fixed or not but laggy games have been on a decline personally.  They recently patched it though and it's still got a wealth of bugs to be incredibly frustrating.  On top of that, the killer now has some really heavy aim assist on his attacks, making it far more difficult to borderline impossible to evade their attacks unless you're turning a corner (then they auto attack into the wall and are briefly stunned).  To give you an idea, the game has pallets which you can throw down to try and block (or stun if timed right) the killer.  As of this latest patch I've stunned 0 killers successfully, even those who were chewing on the pallet when it got dropped and I've been able to stun only 4 killers unsuccessfully... because the game decided their auto attack trumped the barrier between us, so I took a hit anyways.  Just frustrating, the game was way more fun pre-patch.

JULY 1.04 UPDATE REVIEW

[b][u]PROS[/u][/b]
The game is really unique in it's gameplay. I haven't played anything like this and the gameplay always keeps me coming back even before the 1.04 update which drastically improved the game.

There are a lot of reasons to put a lot of hours into the game. You have a level and a rank. As you earn bloodpoints during matches you can spend them on items and add ons for your items in between matches. You also have a rank. It takes 10,500 blood points to earn a "pip". Earn x amount of pips and you gain a rank. You start at rank 20 and you work your way down to rank one.

One of the biggest problems the game had before the 1.04 update was that it was really hard to get a pip as a survivor without getting to the exit. This caused many survivors to resort to infinite juking which is a spot on the map with 2 or more windows nearby that you can vault through. Since i've last played they have made it drastically easier to get a pip as a survivor. They also have removed the majority of the infinite juke spots which is good for people who prefer to play as the killer.

Because of those two adjustments that came with the 1.04 update hook camping is almost non-existant I've played about 5 hours of games since the 1.04 update and I have only encountered one hook camper.

They have added a survive with friends mode which lets you and your friends play public matches together.

Also cosmetics so you can customize your survivor. There aren't many at the moment, but more are going to be added in the future. Presumably for free because the 1.04 update included a new outfit for each survivor for free.

[b][u]CONS[/u][/b]

As much as I love this game there are a few cons that should be mentioned.

Although it is easier to level up as a survivor it's still very annoying when the killer finds you first and then camps you. Luckily that doesn't occur as often and other survivors can save you. If this happens multiple games in a row it can cause some rage.

The rank system could do better by matching similar ranks together more. You'll occasionally run into high rank killers as a low rank survivor. That being said your level (not rank) [b]does not determine skill[/b] I have won against level 30+ killers as a level 10 survivor before.

You have to reinvite friends you are playing survive with friends with after every match.

This is or more like an early access game than a final release.

[b][u]VERDICT[/u][/b]
8.5/10
ДЕРЬМО ПОЛНОЕ!! не покупайте эту поеботу.Ахеренный баланс ребятушки

This is a awesome game. There is a few glitches that pop up here and there, but nothing that would warrent hate for this game. The devs are coming out with new updates and balances for the game to make it more equal and not boring for the killers or the survivors. Would totaly buy this game again.

Overall Dead by Daylight is a fantastic game. There are some issues with current patches (check the date of this review before you read into this little part TOO heavily) where the Killer has way more advantages than the Survivor, BUT just before those patches the Survivor had WAY MORE advantages than the Killer. So right now it is just a matter of finding the perfect balance between the two which I believe the DEVs can do.

Besides that the game is VERY fun to play. I personally prefer Survivor more than Killer because I like the aspect of needing to hide while also getting objectives. However, the Killer can be pretty fun to play as well because it challenges you to hunt down survivors. You can have fun playing this game either by yourself or with your friends. If you are playing by yourself the game is very realistic in the sense that you can't communicate with your fellow survivors if they are VERY far away. There is no built-in voice chat nor can you type to one another once you leave the game lobby. You can, however, use gestures as a way to communicate with one another. Of course if you are playing with friends you can just do a voice chat.

Overall if you're looking for a number rating I'd give the game an 8/10

Я не буду писать о читерах, вылетах, багах, пингерах и ливерах, бесконечном поиске игры, о прелестях баланса и оптимизации: это уже ни для кого не секрет и об этом писали уже все кому не лень. Так же не буду упоминать о том, что задумка хороша, но реализация полное фигня: таких отзывов и так несчетное количество.

Но как-то тему локализации никто особо не поднимал. Что ж, попробую это сделать я.

Разработчики отказывали многим энтузиастам, которые писали им с самого начала бета теста, так как уже нашли студию, которая возьмётся за перевод. Не за бесплатно, конечно же. Они долго брались, брались и выдали нам ЭТО неописуемое чудо гуманитарной мысли. НАЙТИ ВЫЙТИ - и не нужно больше лишних слов. К слову, народные умельцы с ZOG'а уже давно сами распаковали, перевели, запаковали БЕСПЛАТНО, но разработчики всё равно отдали перевод китайцам, которые всё через гугл переводят. А знаешь почему? Потому что этим разрабам пофиг на игроков. Им проще заплатить одной фирме, которая переводит сразу на много языков, но через гугл транслейт, чем общаться с комьюнити разных стран. А самое весёлое, что все разрабы потом пишут этим "переводчикам" положительные отзывы, мол, "крутые ребята за один день на 8 языков!" и другие разработчики видя это и, не хотя особо заморачиваться, идут к этим чуда умельцам да ещё и платят им кругленькие суммы. Удобно устроились, что тут ещё скажешь.

Вывод: разработчиков заботят только свои кошельки. Они обещают золотые горы, а потом, когда подходят дедлайны, за 5 минут варганять на отвали. Этим преложением можно описать всю игру.
Мне жаль, что я уже не могу вернуть деньги.

--------------

Из всего времени создания ДБД, маньяки имели преимущество лишь в самом начале игры. Теперь игра идёт 4 против 1.

Задача сурвов - починить 5 генераторов, открыть ворота, убежать - приблизительное время 5 минут.

Задача маньяка - убить одного сурва (найти сурва, два раза ударить, дождаться когда пройдет время на крюке) - приблизительное время - 5 минут.

Если вы забрали одного сурва - вы совершили подвиг.

Играть станет легче манькам, когда сделают отдельное лобби для гейпати, в настройках которое можно будет отключать.

2022: практически в каждой игре читеры!

I wouldn't wish this game on my worst enemy. It's been out 6 years and somehow still doesn't have a functional matchmaking system. Progression is even more grindy as the teachable perks grow, and the amount of dlc is starting to make Train Simulator sweat. Survivors still love to waste time t-bagging at exit gates, killers still love to face camp. I can hardly blame them; the game makes no attempt to dissuade you from doing either. The anti-tunneling perks they've added are now meta, and any decent killer will account for it. NOED is still in the game. How is that even possible. Their sensitivity adjuster is a PERCENTAGE slider that only goes in increments of 5%. Killer is played from a first person perspective. Its vomit inducing bad.

How'd this game outlive all its competitors? Who knows. Got here first and bought up a bunch of licenses to make easily identifiable characters. These licenses are probably temporary too, if the Demogorgon is anything to go by. So don't count on being able to buy a lot of this licensed DLC in 5 years. FOMO on your character variety baby, what a clown shit company. 

I hope someday we will see the death of this game or the devs get struck by lightning and suddenly learn how to make a half decent video game, but today is not that day for either of those.

Maybe they'll make another Deathgarden to compete against themselves, but maybe next time that one will kill this game instead. Oh, we can dream.

the best horror game ever i love it

4 survivors against 1 deadly killerin the dark.... Sounds fun right? 

Unfortunately this game has little to do with a powerful killer versus four weaker survivors. 
It's about 5 people grinding hundreds of thousands of blood points. 

To keep this game "Scary" it is heavily favored to the killers.

For new players. 

The Killer will find someone. 
1/4 chance of getting found... Once found, you will be killed. 
You will ONLY get away from newbie killers... 
(Unfortunately, high level killers and low level players are regularly matched.)
New Killers will camp the hook, which means at low levels no one helps anyone. If anything bodyblocking and failing skill checks means other players are a liablity... only good to keep the killer busy while you farm blood points. 

Now for experience players there is a WHOLE other set of issues... 

The experience killers will pick you off one by one, However, they don't care about "winning" they want to farm blood points. Some "friendly" Wraiths will spam appear to you for points. Hunters will exploit traps to farm you for points. Hillbillies will tag and leave you as bait to farm other survivors. 

So again... NOT the deadly game of cat and mouse you hoped it would be. 
It is ONLY the perk system that keeps the existing players playing. 
Most players will tell you in chat, they aren't enjoying the game... they are farming blood points to get perks (so then its fun?).... 500k to get to lvl 15. Likely as a new player you will get 5-9k per game. 

Only plus... this game is fun as hell to watch good streamers play. Watching survivors out manuever killers is (was) thrilling. Watching the killer streams is just watching someone mow down survivors.
